parties.title: RelayCon: WWDC 2016
parties.details:
On June 13 at 6 PM we will be hosting an event at 111 Minna Street in San Francisco. Come grab a drink at the bar and hang out before a live panel starts covering that morning's news. Hosts from Connected will be joined by Serenity Caldwell and Jason Snell.
Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event?
Yes. The event will include an open bar, and as such, is ages 21 and up. You will be required to show an ID to enter.
Will I be able to touch Myke's beard?
No. Well, maybe. (Did we mention there's an open bar?)
What if I can't make it?
While that question makes us sad, we will be releasing the audio of the panel as that week's Connected episode. But you can't touch Myke's beard through your podcast player.

WHEN
Monday, June 13, 2016 from 6:00 PM to 8:30 PM (PDT)
WHERE
111 Minna Gallery - 111 Minna Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

parties.title: WWDC Hike 2016
parties.details:
When
June 12th, 2016, the Sunday before WWDC. We'll leave at 2pm.

Where
We'll leave from Lands End. It's about a 20 minute drive from the Moscone. If you drive, you'll have to cab back to your car at the end since the route isn't a loop.

Hiking
It will take about 3-4 hours to hike 6.2 miles (10km). The terrain ranges from dirt trails, streets, and beaches. Comfortable walking shoes are recommended.

We'll see Lands End, Baker Beach, the Golden Gate Bridge, Crissy Field, and Fort Mason along the way. Click the pins on the map for details of each spot. We'll finish at In-N-Out in Fisherman's Wharf. Anyone that wants to stay and eat is welcome.

Don't feel like you have to do all of it. You're more than welcome to come, hike for a bit, and cab back to downtown when you're feeling done.

parties.title: WWDC Diversion
parties.details:
It wouldn't be WWDC without a little Diversion!
Come join your friends from Apteligent & Localytics for the 3rd annual WWDC Diversion Party at 620 Jones on Wednesday, June 15th.  
Mingle over some cocktails, reconnect with old colleagues, make new connections or just enjoy the ambiance. Whatever your reason, this is the place to be.
This can't-miss event has sold out in prior years, so don't be left in the dust. Get your ticket today!

* You must be 21 or older to attend.

WHEN
Wednesday, June 15, 2016 from 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM (PDT)
WHERE
Jones - 620 Jones Street, San Francisco, CA 94102

parties.title: Party â€” AppStorey
parties.details:
You know the computer. Tell your NeXTSTEP story to AppStorey at the AppStorey WWDC Party! This is your chance to learn about, or even contribute to the making of the AppStorey video documentary. We're going to set the record straight. Voice your unique point of view to the making of history's greatest copmuter, and help tell how this one copmuter made a collosal impact on today's mobile computing world. You were part of computer history. AppStorey T-shirts will be available to those who qualify for full or partial video interviews. Professional photographers, producers will be there to capture it all so dont miss out!
WHEN
Wednesday, July 13, 2016 from 8:00 PM to 11:00 PM (PDT)
WHERE
Tommy's Mexican - 5929 Geary Blvd, San Francisco, CA 94121
